text: Kanye nalabo abathatha iMasjid (indlu yokuthandazela) njengendawo yokulimaza (nokona) neyokungakholwa neyokwenza uqhekeko phakathi kwabakholwayo nenjengesiphephelo kulabo abalwa (bangamhloniphi) uMvelinqangi nesithunywa sakhe ngaphambilini futhi ngempela bafunga (bathi) besingafisi lutho ngaphandle kobuhle futhi uMvelinqangi uyabona ukuthi ngempela bona baqamba amanga
